meanings.sent1: I found a tiny nopalito in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The chef added a fresh nopalito to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The nopalito peeked out shyly from the desert soil.
meanings.sent4: The nopalito was a green jewel in the arid landscape.
meanings.sent5: Carefully plucking the nopalito, she admired its unique shape.
